section.title: logdata
section.para: Log a data fragment as part of the error message.
Note: Up to 128 bytes of data will be recorded.

section.title: standalone
section.para: Marks rule as standalone, which means that the engine is allowed to move it anywhere within the phase if it wishes to optimize execution.
